entry.title: WIND WARNING , Richmond
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this morning then mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening then light before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
